name: BLACK: The Noir
description:
Choices matter! A story with multiple endings. As you drive on the highway, you meet a beautiful lady. Will you go with her? Is she what she seems to look? Will she bring colors to your life? Or you're fated to see the black! Find out in this suspenseful noir mysterious crime thriller!

The whole story revolves around the 'BLACK' theme

  • A typical noir
  • A dark night
  • An empty highway
  • A cynical main character (you)
  • A femme fatale?
  • Multiple stories with different fate for every character you meet based on your choices
  • Stylishly Black and White
